  • News

Reference

Directory setup

Functions that combine directory creation and filling

setup_dir() setup_production() setup_sandbox()

Create and fill a forecasting directory

Directory creation

Functions that instantiate a portalcasting directory

create_dir() create_main() create_subs()

Create the structure of a forecasting directory

verify() create()

Verify that folders exist and create folders

Directory filling

Functions that add the files to each of the component subdirectories

fill_dir() fill_data() fill_models() fill_casts() fill_fits() fill_raw()

Fill a forecasting directory with basic components.

model_controls() extract_min_lag() extract_data_sets()

Produce the control lists for models

Casting functions

Functions for fitting models and making predictions into the future

portalcast() cast()

Cast Portal rodents models

verify_models()

Verify that models requested to cast with exist

verify_raw_data()

Verify that the raw data folder exists

models_to_cast()

Determine the paths to the scripts for models to cast with

read_cast_tab() read_cast_tabs() read_cast_metadata() read_model_fits() read_model_casts()

Read in cast output from a given cast

select_casts()

Find casts that fit specifications

update_models()

Update models based on user input controls

Cast processing functions

Functions for processing, evaluating, and combining casts

save_cast_output()

Save cast output to files

ensemble_casts()

Combine (ensemble) casts

measure_cast_level_error()

Measure error/fit metrics for forecasts

add_lead_to_cast_tab() add_err_to_cast_tab() add_covered_to_cast_tab() add_obs_to_cast_tab()

Add the associated values to a cast tab

Data IO

Functions for reading and writing data

read_casts_metadata()

Read in the casts metadata file

download_climate_casts() climate_dl_control() read_climate_casts()

Download and read covariate casts (presently only the NMME)

read_data() read_rodents_table() read_rodents() read_covariates() read_covariate_casts() read_moons() read_metadata()

Read in a data file and format it for specific class

write_data()

Save data out to a file and return it

prep_cast_covariates() save_cast_cov_csv()

Cast the covariates

Metadata management

Functions for managing metadata

prep_metadata()

Prepare a model-running metadata list

write_directory_config() update_directory_config() read_directory_config()

Create, update, and read the directory configuration file

read_casts_metadata()

Read in the casts metadata file

Covariate data management

Functions for preparing covariate data

prep_covariates()

Prepare covariate data for casting

prep_cast_covariates() save_cast_cov_csv()

Cast the covariates

prep_hist_covariates()

Prepare historical covariates data

summarize_daily_weather_by_moon()

Summarize a daily weather table by newmoons

Rodent data functions

Functions that facilitate use of the Portal rodents data

prep_rodents()

Prepare a list of rodents data tables for forecasting

prep_rodents_table() process_rodent_data()

Prepare a rodents data tables for forecasting

prefab_data_sets()

Provide the names of the prefab data sets

rodent_species() all_species() base_species() evalplot_species()

Rodent species abbreviations

is_sp_col() species_from_table()

Determine if columns in a table are species columns

na_conformer()

Conform NA entries to "NA" entries

rodents_control()

Create a control lists for generating a rodents data table

rodents_controls()

Create control lists for generating rodents data tables

remove_incompletes()

Remove any specific incomplete entries as noted by an NA

last_census()

Determine the most recent data collection

most_abundant_species()

Select the most abundant species from a data set

Lunar data functions

Functions for managing the lunar temporal data

prep_moons() format_moons() add_future_moons() add_extra_future_moons()

Prepare lunar data for the portalcasting repository

target_moons() last_moon()

Determine specific newmoon numbers

add_moons_from_date()

Add a newmoon number to a table that has the date

trim_moons()

Trim a moons table based on target moons

Model generating functions

Functions for formatting model-running scripts

model_control()

Create a control list for a model

model_controls() extract_min_lag() extract_data_sets()

Produce the control lists for models

write_model() model_template() control_list_arg()

Write the template for a model into model subdirectory

prefab_models()

Provide the names of the prefab models

Prefabricated models

Functions used to run the prefab models

simplexEDM() GPEDM() jags_RW() AutoArima() NaiveArima() ESSS() nbGARCH() nbsGARCH() pevGARCH()

Functions for the prefab portalcasting models

Model helpers

Functions that help reduce code within model functions

covariate_models()

Create a covariate model list

lag_covariates()

Lag covariate data

jags_ss()

Run a single-species JAGS model

runjags_control()

Create a control list for a runjags JAGS model run

Utility functions

Range of functionalities

check_args() check_arg() check_arg_list()

Check a function's arguments' values for validity

error_if_deep()

Error if a function's request is deeper than can be handled

ifnull() ifna()

Replace a value with an alternative if it is NULL or if it is NA

list_depth()

Determine the depth of a list

return_if_null()

If a value is NULL, trigger the parent function's return

named_null_list()

Create a named empty list

clear_tmp()

Remove files from the tmp subdirectory

update_list()

Update a list's elements

append_csv()

Save data out to a csv, appending the file if it already exists

combine_hist_and_cast()

Combine a historical table and a cast table

match.call.defaults()

Argument matching with defaults

Messenger functions

Functions that provide messages to the user

download() unzip_download() unzip_destins() download_message() download_url() download_destin()

Download raw components of a portalcasting directory

version_message() portalcast_welcome() portalcast_goodbye() sandbox_welcome() creation_message() setup_completion_message() data_readying_message() data_resetting_message() models_running_message() model_running_message() model_done_message() fill_casts_message() fill_fits_message()

Specific message functions

messageq()

Optionally generate a message based on a logical input

messageq_break()

Produce a horizontal break line for messaging

Date formatting

Functions to format dates and date components

foy()

Calculate the fraction of the year from a date

add_date_from_components()

Add a date to a table that has the year month and day as components

cast_window()

Determine the start and end calendar dates for a cast window

Path management

Utilities for quickly retrieving and generally formatting folder and file paths and saving conditions

main_path() sub_path() raw_path() casts_path() fits_path() data_path() models_path() tmp_path() file_path()

Determine the path for a specific level of a forecasting directory

file_ext() path_no_ext()

Determine a file's extension or remove the extension from the file path

files_control()

Create a control list for files

Download functions

Functions for creating API URLs, retrieving, and managing downloaded components

download() unzip_download() unzip_destins() download_message() download_url() download_destin()

Download raw components of a portalcasting directory

download_climate_casts() climate_dl_control() read_climate_casts()

Download and read covariate casts (presently only the NMME)

name_from_url()

Attempt to extract the record name from a URL

NMME_urls()

Provide URLs for the Northwest Knowledge Network's North American Multi-Model Ensemble (NMME) climate forecasts

zenodo_downloads()

Create a downloads list for zenodo downloads

zenodo_url() zenodo_versions()

Obtain the URL for a Zenodo record to be downloaded

Figures

Functions to make standard figures

plot_cast_point()

Plot predictions for a given point in time across multiple species

plot_cast_ts()

Visualize a time series cast of a species

plot_casts_cov_RMSE()

Plot the forecast coverage and RMSE

plot_casts_err_lead()

Plot the forecast error as a function of lead time

Overview

Package overview documentation

portalcasting

Functions for Portalcasting (Forecasting Portal Rodents)

Contents
